content: description want to learn how to knit need a fun homemade holiday gift for family members want to have cute dishcloths to use in your kitchen this is the pattern for you these cloths will make you think of your grandma or nonna in my case and are versatile and easy-to-make difficulty level beginner you need to know how to cast on knit purl yarn over knit together and follow a pattern follow along instagram @creativecritter ravelry @creative-critter questions email me with any questions at creativelycritter@gmail com the details this pattern is a copyright of noelle souza of the creative critter and may not be copied or resold in any way pattern and photos cannot be used for resale purposes please share your work with the hashtag #nonnadishcloth and #thecreativecritter so that i can see your cloths
